metadata.title: CVE-2019-6462 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in cairo 1.16.0. There is an infinite loop in the function _arc_error_normalized in the file cairo-arc.c, related to _arc_max_angle_for_tolerance_normalized.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-11-26, no upstream fix

criterions.comment: cairo package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
